body_html: I've rewritten load and save to no longer use tar. It's 5-10x faster on my machine now, basically matching the speed of cat for simple files. I have to write some tests before sending it out but you can assign this to me.
body_text: I've rewritten load and save to no longer use tar. It's 5-10x faster on my machine now, basically matching the speed of cat for simple files. I have to write some tests before sending it out but you can assign this to me.
body: I've rewritten `load` and `save` to no longer use tar. It's 5-10x faster on my machine now, basically matching the speed of `cat` for simple files. I have to write some tests before sending it out but you can assign this to me.
